titles.title: A bill to require Community Development Block Grant recipients to develop a strategy to support inclusive zoning policies, to allow for a credit to support housing affordability, and for other purposes.
Housing, Opportunity, Mobility, and Equity Act of 2018
Housing, Opportunity, Mobility, and Equity Act of 2018
Housing, Opportunity, Mobility, and Equity Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
